reviews.review: My first PC game, joined the PC platform and jumped on Portal 2. Phenomenol. Not only do you play awesome story you can play community games that are just mind blind blowing genius! Everyone should play this! Its been out for years no excuse not to play it!
传送门2之后再无出其右者
very very and very good game. Good gameplay, good music, good story
Make a 3rd Portal please i am begging you this game is so good and you have the perfect ending to make a second one please
it's ultimatley a timeless game, and even if you don't like it, know tha a lot do, i guess?
Excelent jeux de puzzl à la premiere personne, univers décalé et hilarant, le mode colaboratif est excellent
it's portal 2, what more needs to be said.
very good probably even better then the first

I have played this game for years, and I can say that this is the best game that I have ever played. All the mechanics, characters, just everything is very good. The graphics are also really good for a game that was made in 2011, it has and atmosphere and just brings a charm to me. I also love how the lore is connected with Half-life (which is also a good game you should play.)

This game is very good and I highly recommend you should play it.

Absolutely WONDERFUL. The moment when you're stuck on a level and it finally clicks in your head is absolutely AMAZING. The soundtrack too! I've gotten CHILLS from some of the moments in the game! 100/10, ENTIRELY WORTH MY MONEY.
its nice its worth the mony
очень классная игра с интересным сюжетом. Потянет почти каждый пк. вся игра это сплошная головоломка и если ваш iq больше 0 то вам стоит поиграть. Рortal 2 реально стоит своих денег.
The way the portals place with ease, giving the player almost complete control over where one is placed. Amazing game, 10/10, would recommend.
This game is very fun and addicting. The puzzles are top notch and make you think very hard.
fun game and really challenges the mind in how to figure out the complex but simple puzzles
mozna stawiać portale i w ogole
There is a reason this game has been prased as one of the best. Thats all i got to say.

Excellent jeu ! Les énigmes sont très diversifiées offrant une énorme richesse de gameplay tout en étant parfaitement bien contrôlé (je n'ai pas eu un seul bug ou glitch de tout le jeu). 
L'ambiance est idéale rendant le jeu totalement immersif (on se croirait vraiment dans un laboratoire de test abandonné).
Jeu légèrement répétitif (mais c'est un puzzle game c'est normal) mais l'ambiance ne l'est clairement pas !!
16/20
Kaolo hard broeder, echt wejow zieke shit a damsko mannen

Буквально пару дней назад прошёл сюжетную компанию данной игры и могу сказать следующие: 
Игра сделана великолепно!
Сюжет Portal 2 крепко сбит, не имеет дыр, не затянут. Желание узнать, что будет дальше, возникает после каждого сюжетного поворота. 
Персонажи отлично проработаны, их реплики не звучат, как вырванная из контекста информация. Актёры озвучки и сценаристы справились со своей работой на все сто.
Геймплей, не смотря на свой почтенны возраст ощущается великолепно. Головоломки в достаточной мере сложны, но при это невероятно увлекательны. Физика предметов и отлично проработанные механики вызывают восторг, после прохождения каждой комнаты. Порой сам начинаешь удивляться своей сообразительностью.  
Графика вполне хорошо сохранилась. Играть приятно, а глаз радуется. 
После прохождения Portal 2 мне захотелось познакомиться с остальными одиночными играми от Valve. 
Подводя итоги, мне хотелось бы сказать, что я не зря потратил своё время и деньги на это шикарную игру. Рекомендую всем её пройти и получить море удовольствия от прохождения)
Buen juego, mejores gráficos que el anterior, algunos niveles demasiado enroscados (como tiene que ser) y un fin piolinga. 7/10

Still in 2021 it is the best game of all time. In matter of puzzles, mechanics, graphics, characters and storytelling... it's just a great game in every aspect. Even though i have only 9 hours in this game and i've never played co-op missions as i don't have friends that play games, but every time i beat Portal 2 i literally can't stop crying of how good this is. Thank you valve <3

"I'm pretty sure this game exists.................                                  ...................now that i'm thinking about it, speedrunning this game would be hard if it didn't exist, so it most likely does" -Canteven

An absolute masterpiece, and one of the greatest video games of all time. Kinda sounds hyperbolic, but Portal was special, and this game is a love letter to it that took all the settings and turned them up to 11. The graphics still look current gen, ten years later, because of how smooth they are, and how much work went into them. The story is great, the characters are iconic, and the gameplay is just hard enough. Normally, when we talk about video games, we never say that everyone should play one specific thing, because tastes vary, but I doubt there are many people who wouldn't enjoy this.
Notably, the original still holds up perfectly too, so you should really play it before this, to get the whole story.
BEST GAME I HAVE EVER PLAYED!!!! (except: Minecraft)
OYUN GÜZEL BİTİRİP BİRİP YENİDEN OYNAYABİLİRSİNİZ GRAFİKLERİDE İYİ

this game is the best game i have ever played

El juego es demasiado entretenido, los rompecabezas, la manera en la que usas los portales, hay momentos donde tienes que ser rapido y eso le da mas dinamismo que el primero ademas de la historia de la campaña principal en single player que es muy interesante ademas del modo cooperativo y los mapas de la comunidad, estos ultimos bastante mas complejos pero igual de entretenidos, en conclusion algo que vale mas que la pena, mucho mejor que el primero
Muito bom e daora pra jogar com os amigos e muito bom mesmo
Эта та игра где думаешь что только твой друг даун и не понимает головоломки, а потом понимаешь что вы оба дауны

1)Игра завораживает своей графикой
2)Хороший сюжет (если играл 1 часть, то поймёшь)
+можно закинуть всё и всех на луну
-мы правда потолстели 
Ответ: советую, игра заслуживает вашего лайка
Very fun, would reccomend to others who are looking for a challenge or love puzzles

Portalın 1. oyununa göre 2 kat daha güzel. Hikayesi finalde çok etkili. Full grafiklerle oynanış zevki 10/9 diyebilirim. Genel olarak hikayesinden oynanış zevkine, zorluğundan oyun içi müziklerine kadar 10/9 puan veriyorum. Herkese tavsiye ederim.
En sağlam FPS bulmaca oyunlarından biri. Ayrıca oyunun mizah anlayışı da oldukça sağlam. Kesinlikle oynamanızı tavsiye ederim.
I played this game back when it was on PS3, and loved it. It still holds up till today as a great funny puzzle game.
Super Humor, sympathische Beleidigungen, interessante Story.
Portal 1 was amazing and somehow this is better
i am just realizing after the many years i have played this game and finished it. I never reviewed. Very Good Game.
Спешишь играть, чтобы поскорее увидеть, что ждёт тебя на следующем уровне, и в один момент с сожалением замечаешь, что игра подошла к концу. Возможно, это лучшее, что было у Valve.
Эта игра про то, как быстро ваш друг сможет вывести вас из себя. Каждый уровень с турэлями для вас будет смертным адом. Приятной игры)

This game is amazing. It has a great story, puzzles that make you think, and even a level creator if you've got your own ideas.
This is a great game especially if you are new to the gaming genre. Right off the bat it introduces you to problem solving and FPS controls. Plus there's humor, so why don't you get it?
